description: The hwTunnelGroupUp alarm is reported when one or multiple tunnels in a tunnel group recover from a fault.

event.Summary: Tunnel group up

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwTunnelGroupUp HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwTnlDestination a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwTnlPolicy s EXAMPLE

description: The destination of the tunnel group.
variables.name: HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwTnlDestination

description: Tunnel policy name.
variables.name: HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwTnlPolicy

description: The hwTunnelGroupDown alarm is generated if all tunnels in a tunnel group are faulty.

event.Summary: Tunnel group down

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwTunnelGroupDown HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwTnlDestination a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwTnlPolicy s EXAMPLE

variables.name: HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwTnlDestination

description: Tunnel policy name.
variables.name: HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwTnlPolicy

description: The token count reaches the upper limit.

event.Summary: Token count $v2 reached upper limit of $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwGresmTokenExceed ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwGresmTokenUsedNum i 9999 HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwGresmTokenMaxValue i 9999

description: The textual name of the physical entity. The value of this
object should be the name of the component as assigned by
the local device and should be suitable for use in commands
entered at the device's `console'. This might be a text
name (e.g., `console') or a simple component number (e.g.
port or module number, such as `1'), depending on the
physical component naming syntax of the device.
If there is no local name, or if this object is otherwise
not applicable, then this object contains a zero-length
string.
Note that the value of entPhysicalName for two physical
entities will be the same in the event that the console
interface does not distinguish between them, e.g., slot-1
and the card in slot-1.
variables.name: ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalName

description: The object identifies the number of tokens used currently.
variables.name: HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwGresmTokenUsedNum

description: This object indicates the max value of Token
variables.name: HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwGresmTokenMaxValue

description: The token count falls from the upper limit.

event.Summary: Token count $v2 fell from upper limit

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwGresmTokenExceedClear ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwGresmTokenUsedNum i 9999 HUAWEI-RM-EXT-MIB::hwGresmTokenMaxValue i 9999
